New Records: First player to score over 1,000 runs in T20 international cricket in a calendar year
Key Match Events: Matthew Wade hit three balls in a row from Shaheen Afridi into the stands for sixes
Hasan Ali dropped Matthew Wade on the third ball of the 39th over
Shaheen Afridi dismissed Aaron Finch with the third ball of the innings
Mohammed Rizwan scored 67 off 52 balls, becoming the first player to score over 1,000 runs in T20 international cricket in a calendar year
Fakhar Zaman hit six consecutive sixes in the last over of the innings off Starc
Glenn Maxwell was dismissed, leaving Australia on 96-5 in the 13th over
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan's defeat was harsh as they had played some of the most thrilling cricket over the past three weeks
Miscellaneous Highlights: Matthew Wade was dropped by Hasan Ali on the third ball of the 39th over
Mohammed Rizwan played with a lump on his face after being hit on the cheekbone
Haris Rauf was hit for six off his first ball
Shaheen Afridi's lbw review against Mitch Marsh was turned down by a fine margin
